string-array.name: Location_Descriptions
string-array.item: My hometown, a small tourist destination located on the coast of SC!
Our university! A second hometown to many who go to school here.
Large and famous, the city calls to all of us.
Hometown of my father, a lot of my family live here!
Posh and elegant, London still has global reach.
Center of France, the center of Fashion.
The beating heart of the bethmoth of mainland Asia.
The bright lights and crowded streets remind one of futuristic movies.
Cold and Imperious, the Kremlin watches over all.
The heart of Germany, from this city history and power live hand in hand.
Shanghai, on China’s central coast, is the country\'s biggest city and a global financial hub.

Hong Kong, officially the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region of the People\'s Republic of China, is a metropolitan area and special administrative region of the People\'s Republic of China on the eastern Pearl River Delta of the South China Sea.
Dubai is a city and emirate in the United Arab Emirates known for luxury shopping, ultramodern architecture and a lively nightlife scene.
Los Angeles is a sprawling Southern California city and the center of the nation’s film and television industry.
Dublin, capital of the Republic of Ireland, is on Ireland’s east coast at the mouth of the River Liffey.
Munich, Bavaria’s capital, is home to centuries-old buildings and numerous museums.
Buenos Aires is Argentina’s big, cosmopolitan capital city.
Cairo, Egypt’s sprawling capital, is set on the Nile River.
St. Petersburg is a Russian port city on the Baltic Sea.
Adelaide is South Australia’s cosmopolitan coastal capital. Home to the Mighty Black Stump.
